short_summary: Parcs Canada est à la recherche d'un entrepreneur pour effectuer des travaux de d\u00e9capage des parois rocheuses, de dynamitage de masses rocheuses, de boulonnage de roches et d'excavation de talus rocheux adjacents à l'autoroute 16 dans le parc national Jasper.
description: Rock scaling, trim blasting, rock bolting and excavation on rock slopes adjacent to Highway 16 in Jasper National Park.
full_summary:
**Government of Canada Tender Opportunity**

**Project Title:** 
#### Highway 16 Rock Scaling and Blasting Services in Jasper National Park

**Request for Proposal Number:** 5P468-23-0098/A 

**Submission Deadline:** July 6, 2023, 16:00 PM

**Duration:** Estimated completion date is October 9, 2023.

**Location:** 
- Jasper National Park
- Highway 16 

**Brief Description:**
Parks Canada is seeking a qualified contractor to provide rock scaling and blasting services adjacent to Highway 16 in Jasper National Park.

**Key Requirements:**
- Rock scaling services to remove unstable rock face.
- Blasting services to mitigate rock formation.
- Rock bolting and excavation for slope stabilization.

**Estimated Budget:** 
- Estimated value: $250,001 - $500,000 (including taxes)

**Note:**
- Please ensure that the submission is done in the required format as mentioned in the special instructions.
- Bids sent via SAP ARIBA will not be accepted. Instead, please submit it via email or fax.
- Submission by courier will not be accepted.

**Submission Method:**
- Email: soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca 
- Fax: 1-855-983-1808

**Important Outline:**
- Respondents must meet the technical and contractual requirements mentioned in the RFP document.
- Submission must be in line with the Government of Canada tendering service and requirements.

**Additional Details:**
- Suppliers can obtain the document from the Government of Canada's tendering service at canadabuys.canada.ca/incare pages.
- Addendums will be available on the same web page.
- Suppliers will not be able to participate if they do not fulfill the minimum technical and financial requirements.

**Legal Compliance:**
- All work must be carried out in compliance with the National Park Act.

**Queries and Answers:**
- The deadline for raising queries is five (5) business days prior to the last date for receiving submissions.
- It is your responsibility to ensure that you submit your response before the deadline.

**Language:**
- English and French documents are available on the Government of Canada's tendering service page.

**Points to Consider:**
- The bidder needs to submit their document as an attachment only and not via a link.
- File size under 15 megabytes is required.
